column1: Fuel, transportation, electricity, communication, office supplies and other running costs not for direct program implementation
Investment and maintenance of ICT equipment (computers, mobile phones, etc) for your organization
Salaries and benefits for in-country monitoring and evaluation, policy support, and project management staff
Salaries and benefits for in-country administrative and support staff
Fixed fee for administrative expenses (e.g. Negotiated Indirect Cost Recovery Agreement (NICRA))
